metadata.title: CVE-2023-26257 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
(An issue was discovered in the Connected Vehicle Systems Alliance (COV...)

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-26257` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dlt-daemon - 2.18.10-5
dlt-tools - 2.18.10-5
libdlt-examples - 2.18.10-5
libdlt2 - 2.18.10-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dlt-daemon package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.18.10-5').
